markdownRemark.excerpt: Harry Potter is, with no exceptions, the greatest series ever written. JK Rowling has somehow created something that is at the same time a crucial part of my…
markdownRemark.html:
Harry Potter is, with no exceptions, the greatest series ever written. JK Rowling has somehow created something that is at the same time a crucial part of my childhood growing up, my go-to refuge no matter the circumstance, and also a guide for living life.

This is one of the first things that I wrote down when I was preparing a list of topics that I could write about for my blog, just because there’s so much to write about and so many thoughts and feelings I have about it. I know that there is nothing new or unique I can add to the seemingly limitless compendium of Harry Potter
